Summary: Spotted 2 silver objects moving across the sky, following one another on Rt 100 near the Acme in Chester Springs.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Chester Springs
There were no other sightings in Chester Springs on or around July 2nd 2008
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were heading out to run some errands around 6:30pm yesterday evening. while on route 100 near the acme (byers road), we spotted 2 silver objects in the sky above\in front of us (south of our location). they were moving very quickly across the sky - quicker than jets i have seen. they seemed to be following each other. they did not appear to be jets, as they left no smoke stream behind them. we first noticed them glimmering in the sky, then we could tell they were silver as they moved further along. at first we thought they were jets, but as i said they did not have the jet stream and were moving much more quickly then i have ever seen jets fly. the objects eventually moved out of our sight and across the sky.
